directions: In a serving bowl, mix together the chicken, celery, and red onion. In a separate bowl, stir together the mayonnaise, sour cream, feta cheese, and dill. Pour over the chicken mixture, and stir to blend. Taste, and season with salt and pepper as needed. Serve immediately, or refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: 1 red bell pepper, seeded and diced
1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
title: Feta Chicken Salad
